price: 58. Ya sólo, Allah nde mopesi monene ya bozui, Nkolo bokasi koleka.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha huwa al-razāqu dhū al-quwati al-matīnu
